creation(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->In the vast world, [deity0_name] looked on, and wished for a race of curious beings in [deity0_possessive] own image, and made mankind.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_Nomadism) ->The people went in all directions, looking up to [deity0_name] to guide their path, and the [deity0_type] led their path.
intro(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->The [place_summary] [place_name] was enormous, and explorers traveled to explore the secrets, which pleased the [deity0_type].
conflict(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->A cowardly [foeLeader] grew attached to [foeLeader_possesive] place, and tried to prevent others from leaving.
founderJoin(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->[deity0_name]'s daring follower [founderName] sneaked out of [place_powerCenter], avoided [foeLeader]'s guards, and prepared way for others to follow.
victory(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->One day, people saw a sign, which filled their hearts with determination, and they set on their path in footsteps of [founderName]. [foeLeader] could not stop them.

setup(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->[founderName] learnt everything about the place where [founder_pronoun] was born, and there was nothing more to explore. One day, [founder_pronoun] decided to explore the whole world.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_Nomadism) ->[founderName] preached knowing the world as the true way to knowing oneself.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->First, we lived in place, staying where we were, afraid to leave. But then we opened our eyes and saw the worlds on the horizon.
lesson(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->And we decided to explore what we could.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->For if we want to know life, we must see the world.
archistBasis(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->Archotechs are machines of vast power, knowing the deepest secrets of the world.
archistFact(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->Archotechs look upon the world, and observe those who are brave to seek out its secrets and resources.
archistProphecy(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->[inTheEnd], the true travelers will join the archotechs and rule the world.
animistFact(tag=meme_Nomadism) ->A true spirit is restless, seeking to explore the world.
